name: Chicken and Broccoli Alfredo
author: Campbell's Kitchen
summary: Linguini is mixed with pieces of tender chicken and broccoli flowerets and coated with a rich, satiny Alfredo sauce featuring Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup to make a quick and fabulous dish.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh or frozen broccoli flowerets
1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into cubes
1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or 25% Less Sodium)
directions: Cook linguine according to package directions
Add broccoli for last 4 minutes of cooking time
Cook chicken until browned, stirring often
Add soup, milk, cheese, black pepper and linguine mixture and heat through
